mapper.select: select c.id as id, c.pid as pid, c.permission_name as permissionName, c.pid as pwd, c.value as value, c.path as path, c.note as note, c.status as status, c.create_time as createTime, c.sort as sort from mas_admin_permission_relation a inner join mas_admin b on a.admin_id=b.id inner join mas_permission c on a.permission_id = c.id where b.id = #{adminId} and c.status = 1
select c.* from mas_admin_role_relation a inner join mas_admin b on a.admin_id = b.id inner join mas_role c on a.role_id = c.id where b.id = #{adminId}

select c.id as id, c.permissionName from mas_admin_permission_relation a inner join mas_admin b on a.admin_id = b.id inner join mas_permission c on a.permission_id = c.id where c.pid = 0 and b.id = #{adminId}

select a.id as id, a.user_name as userName, a.nick_name as nickName, a.phone as phone, c.id as roleId, c.role_name as role from mas_admin a left join mas_admin_role_relation b on a.id = b.admin_id left join mas_role c on b.role_id = c.id where a.id = #{adminId}
